title: Superb Land with a Large house for Sale
details:
Superb 40 perch land with a large 4 bedroom house in Bemmulla.
3 bathrooms with fittings and the house is fully tiled.
Beautiful in-house waterfall and garden.
Well water available.
Kitchen, pantry, large living room, garage and a roof-top open area is available.
Calm location facing paddy-fields.
10 minutes walking distance to Bemmulla Railway Station.
2.7 km to Colombo-Kandy main road.
3 km to Yakkala Lyceum International School.
Dispensary in the neighbourhood.
Clear deeds.
Very good investment.
